name: asagi
normalized: kuh… this time, over here!
ignoring the pain in her side, asagi also began to jump.
she sprang up, twisting her body one full turn in the air.
using the centrifugal force from that, she brought down her sword.
aiming for the beast's head, with all her strength.

name: asagi
normalized: i wonder how thick-skulled you are?!
her katana had the force to stop the majuu's furious charge attack, but, as expected, it ended up being repelled.
however, there was a slight reaction.
seizing the opportunity of asagi having stopped moving for a moment, the beast howled and snapped at her, baring not its horn, but its fangs, which were dripping with drool.

name: asagi
normalized: ──fuh!
asagi promptly swung her sword at the base of the horn, and hit the majuu's face.

name: asagi
normalized: ──it's!
a reaction again.
and then, the noise of something creaking came across.
not pleased that she had stopped it, the majuu repelled the sword by shaking its head.
however, asagi was calm.
she didn't fight against being sent flying, and used that reaction to twist her body.
leaving it to her spiritual energy, she made use of the rotational force, and put all her might into the blade.
aiming for the majuu's horn.
the place that a crack had set into from the previous attack.

name: asagi
normalized: you should have covered your horn with fur as well, shouldn't you?!
asagi's light-speed longsword scythed down over the majuu's head.
the majuu's enormous horn was cut right in half from the base.
the beast howled, practically loud enough to crack the sky.
without hesitating from that, asagi leapt high up.
she focused her spiritual energy in midair.
and then――

name: asagi
normalized: haah!
aiming the tip of her sword downwards, she swooped down over the majuu's head.
without erring in its aim, the katana pierced into the cross-section of its lost horn.
the longsword pierced through the majuu's cranium, and stuck out from its throat.
the beast had been completely brought down.
asagi jumped back, pulling her sword out from the top of the majuu's head.
the majuu, which didn't even have enough strength left to howl anymore, fell prostrate on the floor of the rooftop just like that, making a loud noise.
and then, immediately, its body was enveloped in flame, as if it had ignited in oil or something.
the flames had developed strong thermal power in the blink of an eye, and ended up burning the majuu to ashes in a mere moment.
looking at its cinders, asagi felt slightly relieved.

name: asagi
normalized: if i hadn't noticed the horn's reaction, this battle…
she stared at the ashes, which rode on the wind and scattered around.
